reference_a:
@article{blanke2020,
  title = {Thinking mindfully: {{How}} mindfulness relates to rumination and reflection in daily life.},
  shorttitle = {Thinking mindfully},
  author = {Blanke, Elisabeth S. and Schmidt, Mirjam J. and Riediger, Michaela and Brose, Annette},
  date = {2020-12-01},
  journaltitle = {Emotion},
  shortjournal = {Emotion},
  volume = {20},
  number = {8},
  pages = {1369--1381},
  publisher = {American Psychological Association},
  issn = {1528-3542},
  doi = {10.1037/emo0000659}
}
topics: mindfulness, reflection, affect, well-being, emotion regulation

features.name: miss_status
features.coding:
Missingness status of the beep
0 = missing
1 = partial missing
2 = completed
3 = skipped

features.name: attention_present
features.coding:
Please recall the period since the last measurement/since you woke up: How did you behave, what did you think and feel? That is what the following questions are about.
I focused my attention on the present moment. 
0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly

features.name: opened_up
features.coding:
Please recall the period since the last measurement/since you woke up: How did you behave, what did you think and feel? That is what the following questions are about.
I opened myself up to what was happening.
0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly

features.name: concentrated_present
features.coding:
Please recall the period since the last measurement/since you woke up: How did you behave, what did you think and feel? That is what the following questions are about.
I concentrated on what I was doing at that moment. 
0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly

features.name: nonjudgmental_feelings
features.coding:
Please recall the period since the last measurement/since you woke up: How did you behave, what did you think and feel? That is what the following questions are about.
I thought some of my thoughts/feelings were slightly off. (Reverse-coded)
0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly

features.name: nonjudgmental_thoughts
features.coding:
Please recall the period since the last measurement/since you woke up: How did you behave, what did you think and feel? That is what the following questions are about.
Things went through my mind that I should not really be engaging myself with. (Reverse-coded)
0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly

features.name: nonjudgmental_behavior
features.coding:
Please recall the period since the last measurement/since you woke up: How did you behave, what did you think and feel? That is what the following questions are about.
I thought I could have acted more appropriately at a certain time.  (Reverse-coded)
0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly

features.name: happy
features.coding:
How did you feel since waking up/ since the last beep? Please indicate how well the following affective items describe your feelings during this time.
Happy?
0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly

features.name: content
features.coding:
How did you feel since waking up/ since the last beep? Please indicate how well the following affective items describe your feelings during this time.
Content?
0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly

features.coding:

0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly

features.name: downhearted
features.coding:

Downhearted?
0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly

features.name: distressed
features.coding:

features.coding:

0 = Does not apply at all

features.name: ruminate_feelings
features.coding:
How well do the following statements describe how you handled your thoughts and feelings since waking up/ since the last beep?
I could not stop thinking about my feelings.
0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly

features.name: ruminate_things
features.coding:
How well do the following statements describe how you handled your thoughts and feelings since waking up/ since the last beep?
I could not stop thinking about certain things.
0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly

features.name: relaxed_thoughts_feelings
features.coding:
How well do the following statements describe how you handled your thoughts and feelings since waking up/ since the last beep?
I thought about my feelings in a calm and relaxed fashion.
0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly

features.name: relaxed_thoughts_things
features.coding:
How well do the following statements describe how you handled your thoughts and feelings since waking up/ since the last beep?
I thought about certain things in a calm and relaxed fashion.
0 = Does not apply at all
6 = Applies strongly
